channel.title: engineering on Z
channel.description: Recent content in engineering on Z

item.title: What are you worth ?
item.description:
In today’s economy it has become increasingly difficult to estimate one’s worth. In This video I will explore how we can estimate our salary/worth using a few basic techniques
1. Analyze your skill level Here is Tim Corey talking about what it means to be a senior developer
2. Analyze the market to find your avarage salary Analyzing the market can be tricky, here is a tool github uses to find average salaries in certain countries and here is a tool called payscale which can also be helpful
